definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The solar activity and volcanic eruptions are the main factors of climatic changes during the Little Ice Age.
sentences.chinese: 太陽活動和火山活動是小冰期氣候變化的主要因素。

sentences.english: Still another asserted that solar activity caused climate shifts.
sentences.chinese: 還有演示聲稱，是太陽活動導致了氣候轉變。

sentences.english: The last solar maximum occurred in 2001.
sentences.chinese: 上一次的太陽活動峯年出現在2001年。

sentences.english: The latest minimum was particularly weak and long- lasting.
sentences.chinese: 而最近的太陽活動谷年就尤其微弱且持續時間較久。

sentences.english: When solar activity is high, solar extreme ultraviolet rays warm and expand the thermosphere.
sentences.chinese: 當太陽活動高，太陽極端的紫外線加熱並擴大熱層。

sentences.english: The absolute value of barometric coefficient is biggest when the level of solar activities is highest.
sentences.chinese: 太陽活動最高的年，氣壓修正係數的絕對值最大。

sentences.english: So why does solar activity have these effects?
sentences.chinese: 那麼爲什麼太陽活動有這些作用？

sentences.english: Recently UK researchers linked low solar activity and freezing cold winters in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 最近英國科學家認爲歐洲冷冬和太陽活動低有關。

sentences.english: Solar activity waxes and wanes according to approximately 11-year cycles.
sentences.chinese: 太陽活動的盈虧週期大約是11年。

sentences.english: The sun's activity waxes and wanes on an 11-year cycle.
sentences.chinese: 太陽活動的盛衰以11年爲一個週期。

sentences.english: But he warned space-weather experts are concerned about future solar events.
sentences.chinese: 但他警告說太空氣象專家對未來的太陽活動很擔心。

sentences.english: The blast was the largest so far in the new solar cycle.
sentences.chinese: 這是在新的太陽活動週期中最大的一次爆炸。

sentences.english: This paper gives a review of research advances of the solar-like activities in late-type stars.
sentences.chinese: 本文綜述有關晚型恆星中的類太陽活動的研究進展。
